definition: "noch" is an adverb that typically expresses the continuation or addition of something. It is commonly used to convey the meaning of "still" or "yet" in various contexts. Additionally, it can indicate an additional quantity or time, often used in comparisons or to emphasize a particular point.

examples.german: Kannst du mir noch etwas Wasser geben?
examples.english: Can you give me some more water?
I still have to go shopping.
Do you have any more questions?
